main event: A bright white object with a trail was sighted in the sky over Saskatoon, Canada for approximately 15-20 minutes.
interesting points: The object had a circular, doughnut shape and was about the size of a half dollar.
The object had a trail that was about half the size of the object itself.
The object was stationary and silent, and disappeared over the horizon.
The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds.
The sighting was reported to the authorities by a witness who observed the object.
sighted object: bright white object with a trail
